jarā maraṇam aniccataḥ manasikarotaḥ pe

original: jarāmaraṇaṁ dukkhato manasikaroto, jarāmaraṇaṁ anattato manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati
analyzed: jarā maraṇam dukkhataḥ manasikarotaḥ jarā maraṇam anattataḥ manasikarotaḥ obhāsaḥ uppajjati

original: …pe… ñāṇaṁ uppajjati, pīti uppajjati, passaddhi uppajjati, sukhaṁ uppajjati, adhimokkho
analyzed: pe ñāṇam uppajjati pīti uppajjati passaddhi uppajjati sukham uppajjati adhimokkhaḥ

original: uppajjati, paggaho uppajjati, upaṭṭhānaṁ uppajjati, upekkhā uppajjati, nikanti uppajjati,
analyzed: uppajjati paggahaḥ uppajjati upaṭṭhānam uppajjati upekkhā uppajjati nikanti uppajjati
nikanti dhammo ti nikantim āvajjati
tatas vikkhepaḥ uddhat ca
tena uddhaccena viggahita mānasaḥ
jarā maraṇam anattataḥ upaṭṭhānam yathābhūtam na ppajānāti

original: Jarāmaraṇaṁ aniccato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti, jarāmaraṇaṁ dukkhato upaṭṭhānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
analyzed: jarā maraṇam aniccataḥ upaṭṭhānam yathābhūtam na pajānāti jarā maraṇam dukkhataḥ upaṭṭhānam yathābhūtam na pajānāti
tena vuccati
dhamma uddhacca vigga hita mānasaḥ hoti

original: So samayo, yaṁ taṁ cittaṁ ajjhattameva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: saḥ samayaḥ yam tam cittam ajjhattam eva santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati
tassa maggaḥ sañjāyati iti
katham maggaḥ sañjāyati pe
evam maggaḥ sañjāyati
evam saññojanāni pahīyanti anusayāḥ byantīhonti
evam dhamma uddhacca viggahitam mānasam hoti
o bhāse ca iva ñāṇe ca
pītiyā ca vikampati
passaddhiyā sukhe ca iva
yehi cittam pavedhati
adhimokkhe ca paggāhe
upaṭṭhāne ca kampati
upekkhā vajjanāya ca iva
upekkhāya ca nikantiyā
imāni dasa ṭhānāni
paññā yassa pariccitā
dhamma uddhacca kusalaḥ hoti
na ca sammoha gacchati
vikkhipati ca iva kilissati ca
cavati citta bhāvanā
vikkhipati na kilissati
bhāvanā parihāyati
vikkhipati na kilissati
bhāvanā na parihāyati

original: Na ca vikkhipate cittaṁ na kilissati,
analyzed: na ca vikkhipate cittam na kilissati
na cavati citta bhāvanā

original: Imehi catūhi ṭhānehi cittassa saṅkhepavikkhepaviggahitaṁ dasa ṭhāne sampajānātīti.
analyzed: imehi catūhi ṭhānehi cittassa saṅkhepa vikkhepa viggahitam dasa ṭhāne sampajānāti iti
yuga naddha kathā niṭṭhitā
